full_summary:
# Standing Offer W0501-23C040A: Dry Van and Reefer Trailer Rental Services
### Notice Details

* **Tender Reference**: WS4337975458
* **Publication Date**: December 14, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 16, 2024, at 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Tender Description

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is seeking to establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the rental of the following trailers:

* Up to ten (10) dry van trailers (53’ Tandem Air Ride)
* Up to five (5) reefer van trailers (53’ Tandem Air Ride)

The trailers will be used for training purposes at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Gagetown-Oromocto, New Brunswick. They may also be used to transport equipment throughout Canada or the United States. All rental units must be licensed and registered accordingly.

The term of this RISO is one (1) year, with two (2) option years. The procurement process involves a standing offer agreement, which is not a contract. The Standing Offer is intended to establish a relationship with potential suppliers, from which call-ups may be made, on an as-and-when-required basis.

### Key Information

* **Area of Delivery**: CFB Gagetown-Oromocto, New Brunswick
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None specified
* **Currency**: All prices will be in Canadian dollars, subject to Harmonized Sales Tax (HST)

### Contact Information

Inquiries can be directed to:

* Gary Bryant, PSPC
* Email: [gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Telephone: Not available
